title: Just a reminder that Tristanas kit bypasses every single weakness of a marsman
body: Instant steroid, mobility that resets in multiple ways, self peel, turret destruction

{{champion:222}} {{champion:236}} are also great at taking turrets.  Lucian's passive is a steroid, and his mobility is his form of self peel.  Jinx's minigun passive is a fast-charging steroid, she has a slow and self peel, and her passive gives her mobility.  Xayah's W is a steroid, her root is self peel, and her ult gives her untargetable mobility.  

Tristana isn't as big a problem as you think she is.  She snowballs super hard when fed, just like most champions.  It just gets exacerbated by her gradually increasing AA range as she gets more levels while also getting more fed.
Yes, and because of that she has no early game power to rival her opponents in lane.
